verses.verse: Be you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> as <S%G27>dear<s%> <S%G5043>children;<s%>

And <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G26>loved<s%> us, and has <S%G3860>given<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> for us an <S%G4376>offering<s%> and a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> for a sweet <S%G2175>smelling<s%> <S%G3744>smell.<s%>

But <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> let it not be <S%G3366>once<s%> <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, as <S%G4241>becomes<s%> <S%G40>saints;<s%>

<S%G2532>Neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G151>filthiness,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G3473>foolish<s%> <S%G3473>talking,<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> <S%G2160>jesting,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are not <S%G433>convenient:<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> giving of <S%G2169>thanks.<s%>

For <S%G5124>this<s%> you <S%G1097>know,<s%> that <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4205>fornicator,<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> person, <S%G2228>nor<s%> <S%G4123>covetous<s%> man, <S%G3739>who<s%> is an <S%G1496>idolater,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> any <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G538>deceive<s%> you with <S%G2756>vain<s%> <S%G3056>words:<s%> for <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G2064>comes<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> on the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience.<s%>
Be not you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4830>partakers<s%> with them.
For you were <S%G4218>sometimes<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> are you <S%G5457>light<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> as <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G5457>light:<s%>
(For the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G19>goodness<s%> and <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G226>truth;<s%>)
<S%G1381>Proving<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
And have <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4790>fellowship<s%> with the <S%G175>unfruitful<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> them.
For it is a <S%G149>shame<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G1096>done<s%> of them in <S%G2931>secret.<s%>

But <S%G3956>all<s%> things that are <S%G1651>reproved<s%> are <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> by the <S%G5457>light:<s%> for <S%G3956>whatever<s%> does <S%G5319>make<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> is <S%G5457>light.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1453>Awake<s%> you that <S%G2518>sleep,<s%> and <S%G450>arise<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall give you <S%G2017>light.<s%>
<S%G991>See<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that you <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G199>circumspectly,<s%> not as <S%G781>fools,<s%> but as <S%G4680>wise,<s%>
<S%G1805>Redeeming<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> are <S%G4190>evil.<s%>
<S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G5124><s%> be you not <S%G878>unwise,<s%> but <S%G4920>understanding<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is.
And be not <S%G3182>drunk<s%> with <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> is <S%G810>excess;<s%> but be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

<S%G2980>Speaking<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms<s%> and <S%G5215>hymns<s%> and <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> and <S%G5567>making<s%> <S%G5567>melody<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

Giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
<S%G5293>Submitting<s%> yourselves <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another<s%> in the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G1135>Wives,<s%> <S%G5293>submit<s%> yourselves to <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> as to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

For the <S%G435>husband<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1577>church:<s%> and he is the <S%G4990>savior<s%> of the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G235>Therefore<s%> as the <S%G1577>church<s%> is <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> let the <S%G1135>wives<s%> be to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> thing.

<S%G435>Husbands,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1438>your<s%> <S%G1135>wives,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G1577>church,<s%> and <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> for it;
That he might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> and <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> it with the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> by the <S%G4487>word,<s%>

That he might <S%G3936>present<s%> it to <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G1741>glorious<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> not <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4696>spot,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4512>wrinkle,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> thing; but that it should be <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G299>without<s%> <S%G299>blemish.<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> their <S%G1135>wives<s%> as their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>bodies.<s%> He that <S%G25>loves<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

For <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G4218>ever<s%> yet <S%G3404>hated<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> but <S%G1625>nourishes<s%> and <S%G2282>cherishes<s%> it, <S%G2532>even<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> the <S%G1577>church:<s%>
For we are <S%G3196>members<s%> of his <S%G4983>body,<s%> of his <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and of his <S%G3747>bones.<s%>

For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G473>cause<s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and shall be <S%G4347>joined<s%> to his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and they <S%G1417>two<s%> shall be <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
<S%G5124>This<s%> is a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3466>mystery:<s%> but I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

<S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> let <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1520><s%> one of you in <S%G3588>particular<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G5613>even<s%> as <S%G1438>himself;<s%> and the <S%G1135>wife<s%> see that she <S%G5399>reverence<s%> her <S%G435>husband.<s%>
